alert.note: Alert for Allen; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rapides, southeastern Vernon and north central Allen Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 411 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fullerton, or near Pitkin, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pitkin, Cravens, Fullerton and Union Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
